archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.1.5a: a) severity ratings, detailing the level and scale of disruption to critical business processes (e.g. disruption to single user, multiple users, minor systems or major systems)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
